messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] wow bear help
messages.msgSnippet: Okay, I am a complete moron, but a happy moron. I found The Venture Co. See I was looking for venture co and not finding it. Anyhow. Linnaea and I have just
messages.messageBody:
Okay, I am a complete moron, but a happy moron. I found The Venture Co. See
I was looking for venture co and not finding it. Anyhow. Linnaea and I have
just created a couple of new horde characters and we'll come play soon.

Schuyler
www.waynforth.blogspot.com
----- Original Message -----
From: "patrick morris" <katinandrea@...>
To: <unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, January 10, 2007 11:00 PM
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] wow bear help


> hi I don't want to alarm you but I think only druids turn into bears
> not warlocks, so use it to turn a new leaf and join horde of
> unschoolers on THE VENTURE CO server/ realm
> currently 29 unschoolers
> patrick
> ps bear druid is very cool, the best tank element in the game
>
>
>
>
> Yahoo! Groups Links
>
>
>
>

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] wow bear help
messages.msgSnippet: I love my druid bear, well, in a platonic way. But looking at the link Ren sent, there is a way to be a Bear in battle for a warlock. Pretty cool. Schuyler
messages.messageBody:
I love my druid bear, well, in a platonic way. But looking at the link Ren
sent, there is a way to be a Bear in battle for a warlock. Pretty cool.

Schuyler

P.S. I am going to have to contact WoW europe and see if there is a way we
can play. I am so wanting to be in the unschooling horde!
www.waynforth.blogspot.com

messages.subject: wow bear help
messages.msgSnippet: hi I don t want to alarm you but I think only druids turn into bears not warlocks, so use it to turn a new leaf and join horde of unschoolers on THE VENTURE CO
messages.messageBody:
hi I don't want to alarm you but I think only druids turn into bears
not warlocks, so use it to turn a new leaf and join horde of
unschoolers on THE VENTURE CO server/ realm
currently 29 unschoolers
patrick
ps bear druid is very cool, the best tank element in the game
